pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Armbian 是为 ARM 单板机提供的基于 Debian 和 Ubuntu 的操作系统。Armbian 仓库包括专用的 u-boot、内核及各种支持文件。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"可以使用以下方法更换软件源："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["运行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"armbian-config"}]," -> Personal -> Mirrors -> 选择镜像站。"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/armbian.list"}],"，将 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"http://apt.armbian.com"}]," 替换为以下链接"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["然后执行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"apt update"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"这可以被以下命令完成"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}sed -i.bak 's#http://apt.armbian.com#{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}#g' /etc/apt/sources.list.d/armbian.list
{{sudo}}apt update","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
"]}],"
"]}]]}]

meta.title: Armbian 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
